item.description: ABOUT .content { text-align: center; } Coming soon. Founder of ~~LINEA EDITS~~ and mastermind of other experimental music projects. AKA Elliot k, banda randa, Acid bar, Don Macello. --- ## SC INTERFACE Digital sounds from a forgotten plain of reality, where the data left over on broken hard drives ends up. --
